mapper.insert: insert into payment_tb (tid, order_number, amount, reg_date) values (#{tid},#{orderNumber},#{amount},now())
mapper.update: update booking_tb set payment_tid = #{tid} where id=#{id}
update rental_tb set payment_tid = #{tid} where show_tb_id=#{id}
update payment_tb set refunded_amount = refunded_amount + #{amount} where tid = #{tid}
mapper.select: select payment_tid from booking_tb where id = #{id}
select payment_tid from rental_tb where show_tb_id = #{id}
select amount from payment_tb where tid = #{tid}
select * from show_tb s join rental_tb r on s.id = r.show_tb_id where r.status = '정상' AND end_date >= date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') limit 5;
